title: Constant fps drops throughout past patches

replies.body: If this is happening every time minions spawn, those minion game files might be damaged somehow. Let's run a quick repair through the game client, but also be sure to hit up this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a few other steps you can take to smooth that fps out.

i turned on "wait for vertical synch" and it solved it but now i get a smooth 60 fps rather than 80. also some actions have a delay like when vayne punished me against a wall it had a small delay to me moving to the wall i was hit against.
never mind it is still fps drops, i patched the "corrupted files" and defragged. dude it's just the game something is broken af.
